name: Lazers (GhostGaming)
description:
Lazers is a fun little game created for the 1-Bit Weekend Game Jam.

You'll need to push Mirrors to reflect the Laser from the Laser Emitter to one or more Laser Receivers in 8 challenging and unique levels. Sometimes Locks will block your path and other times you'll need to teleport to different places in order to complete the level.

After each unlocked level you will gain a new Color Palette to change how the game looks.

Created with GameMaker Studio 2.
